alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 10:47AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Campbell and northwestern Crook Counties through 1115 AM MDT... At 1047 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles north of New Haven to near Oshoto to 4 miles northeast of Camplex Event Facility. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oshoto around 1050 AM MDT. New Haven around 1055 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Carlile and Devils Tower National Monument. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 133 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These storms are producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
